|cpu1chip1 = Marvell;88F6820;(Armada 385); |cpu1_cores = 2 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A9 |cpu1spd = 1.6 GHz <!-- 1.6 / 1.8 / 2.0 GHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = SPI NOR |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Macronix;MX66L1G45GMI-10G; |flash1size = 128 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = DDR3 |ram1type1 = SDRAM |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 2 GiB |ram1chip = Nanya;NT5CC512M8EN-EK; |ram1_num = 4 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = yes |eth2chip = Marvell;88E1512; |eth3chip = Marvell;88E1512; |sw1chip = Marvell;88E6176; |wan_ports = 2 |wan_speed = 1GbE |lan_ports = 5 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 70:4C:A5 |oui = 1C:49:7B
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;;; |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->

|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 2.5 |pwr_conn = Molex (2-pin)
|serial = yes,, RJ-45 console,, (9600 8N1) |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = RTC w/ battery, metal case, heat sink |addchip = Low Power 3-5V, 250kbps RS232 Transceiver;Zywyn;ZT3232L;;1;,,, Hardware Monitoring IC w/ PCI 3.0 Interface;Nuvoton;NCT7802Y;;1;,,, 16-Bit I2C & SMBus I/O Expander w/ Interrupt Output;TI;TCA9555;;1;,,, 4.5-28V, 3A Synchronous Step-Down DC/DC Converter;TI;TPS54336A;;1;,,, 3A Dual Channel Synchronous Step-Down Switcher;TI;TPS54394;;2;,,, 5A Step-Down Regulator w/ Integrated Switcher;TI;TPS53316;;1;,,, 1.8A Sink/Source Bus Termination Regulator;Richtek;RT9045;;1;,,, 3-State Octal Buffer/Line Driver;NXP;LVC244A;;1; |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac
|defaulip = 192.168.1.99 |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = fortinet |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = Gemtek |manuf_model = WRTM-319N |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = OpenWrt

|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1mod = Gemtek WMDQ-177ACN |rad1modif = Mini PCIe |rad1chip1 = Qualcomm Atheros;QCA9892; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL, RP-SMA |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |nqam1 = <!-- 600, 800, 900, 1000, --> |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
|wi2_if_name = |rad2mod = Gemtek WMDQ-177ACN |rad2modif = Mini PCIe |rad2chip1 = Qualcomm Atheros;QCA9892; |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = U.FL, RP-SMA |rad2txchains = 2 |rad2rxchains = 2 |rad2sstreams = 2 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac |rad2ac = 867 |nqam2 = <!-- 600, 800, 900, 1000, --> |rad2n = 300 |rad2a = 54 |rad2freq = 5
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "Model: P17457-04", "FG-51E", "Fortinet, Inc", "19K-514-6000R RoHs", :and "WRTM-319N_214US_DR_V01" are silkscreened on board.
OEM: [[Gemtek]] WRTM-319N
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: [[Marvell]] 88F6820 ''Armada 385'' :Dual-Core ARM (Cortex-A9) @1.6GHz *Storage: 128MB SPI (NOR) Flash, *Memory: 2GB (DDR3) SDRAM *Wi-Fi: 2x 802.11abgn/ac Qualcomm Atheros QCA9892 *Network: 7x GbE ports *USB: 1x USB 3.0 port *Power Source: 12V/3A via 2-pin Molex
==Links of Interest== *[https://www.firewalls.com/pub/media/wysiwyg/datasheets/Fortinet/FG-FW-50E.pdf Data Sheet]
